gov.nih.nlm.ling.process

Interface SectionSegmenter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    I2B2SectionSegmenter, SPLSectionSegmenter

    public interface SectionSegmenter
    An interface for section segmentation modules.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void segment(Document document)
      Segments the Document into sections (zones) and updates its section information.

    • Method Detail

      • segment

        void segment(Document document)
        Segments the Document into sections (zones) and updates its section information.
        Parameters:
        document - the document to segment into sections
